ResearchTabDef.label: Mechadendrites Research
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Unlock new technologies by researching at a research bench. You can only have one active project at a time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Mechadendrite Implantation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into the possibility of attaching new limbs onto colonists' bodies via rudimentary methods.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Additional Mechadendrite Implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Initial Implantation of new limbs via the spinal cord has seen success, expand upon this via more connections into the spinal cord to provide more fluid control over more mechadendrites.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Mechadendrites
ResearchProjectDef.description: Building upon the research into attaching additional limbs your colonists have devised a type of implant that are being called 'Mechadendrites', a small limb that attaches itself onto the colonist's back and nervous system via the spine using basic connectors

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechadendrites
ResearchProjectDef.description: Taking lessons from your first foray into mechadendrites, your colonists have devised a method of creating better mechadendrites using more robust materials and connecting them to your colonists' bodies. This research could be used to specialise future mechadendrites for specific jobs.
